name: Black White Flip - A Puzzle Game
name_original: Black White Flip - A Puzzle Game
description:
BLACK WHITE FLIP

Black White Flip is a puzzle game which I have been working on in the past 3 months

Flip the dots to the same color. Various game mechanics: lock, bomb, linkage etc. to add up the difficulty. Kinda luck-based but it's definitely fun to play after figuring out some patterns and tricks.

Currently 100 levels are made and (maybe) more will come in the future. Hope you enjoy the game!

==================================================

HOW TO PLAY

Left click to choose a pattern and flip the dots until all dots have the same color

Press space bar to rotate the pattern

Press "R" to restart the level

==================================================

GAME MECHANICS

Lock: dots locked need to be flipped to be unlocked and further flipped to change colour

Yinyang: can be counted as either black or white do not change upon flipping

Bomb: flipping dots with bomb trigger dots in 3*3 area to be flipped

Linkage: flipping also flip linked dot

Stretch: pattern flip dots in according direction

==================================================

ISSUE

If you are using google chrome and face fps issue, consider turning on hardware acceleration in google chrome settings
